But wait, the exact wording is "3.2% less rating," so it implies a percentage decrease from the earliest-rated episode to "arienai kisu." Since 22.4 - 19.2 = 3.2, which is exactly 3.2% of 22.4 (because 3.2/22.4 = 0.1428, so 14.28%, not 3.2%). So the percentage decrease isn't accurate.
